examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
The lingonberry sauce perfectly complemented the roasted turkey at Thanksgiving dinner.
words.defineEn: used to show a particular place or position
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị một địa điểm hoặc vị trí cụ thể

examples: The company kicked off the CEO for embezzlement.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
The director praised the actor for their outstanding performance in the movie.
The doctor examined her neck for any signs of injury.
Even the experts took the painting for a genuine Van Gogh.
words.defineEn: used to indicate who is supposed to have or use something or where something is intended to be put
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để cho biết ai được cho là có hoặc sử dụng thứ gì đó hoặc nơi dự định đặt thứ gì đó

examples: The film received lavish praise from critics for its groundbreaking visual effects, compelling storyline, and outstanding performances.
The teacher withdrew the assignment from the class website.
The machine takes its name from its inventor.
The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
The farmer harvested the fresh broccoli florets from the garden for market.
words.defineEn: used for showing the place where a person or thing comes from
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị nơi mà một người hoặc vật đến từ

examples: The police closed in.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
The birds built their nest in the tree.
words.defineEn: at a point inside or within a space or an area
words.defineVi: tại một điểm bên trong hoặc trong một không gian hoặc một khu vực

examples: The brochure speaks of beautiful secluded grounds.
What's your shirt made of?
Ha, yeah right, and the moon is made of cheese.
The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
words.defineEn: used when stating one's opinion about someone or something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi nêu ý kiến của một người về ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: To turn cartwheels/somersaults.
To save a penalty.
To play the piano/violin/flute.
To call a meeting/strike.
To have a meeting/a party/a concert.
words.defineEn: used to say where someone or something goes
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói nơi một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó đi

examples: Retirement often brings with it a massive drop in income.
My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
The restaurant served their fish and chips with a side of brown sauce.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
My mother pickled radishes with vinegar and spices.
words.defineEn: used when two or more things or people are together in a single place
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi hai hoặc nhiều thứ hoặc người ở cùng một nơi

examples: Language is a window into the world.
The poem uses simple language.
Use plain language instead of jargon.
Don’t use bad language.
The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
words.defineEn: the system of communication by spoken or written words, that is used by people of a particular country or region
words.defineVi: hệ thống giao tiếp bằng lời nói hoặc chữ viết, được sử dụng bởi những người của một quốc gia hoặc khu vực cụ thể

examples: MALCOLM BRABANT: Tourism generates $200 billion a year for Spain.
So tourism was really the saving point for Monterey.
Any downgrade of the reef's status could cut tourism revenue.
It needs tourism, and
They bring tourism, jobs, food, etcetera.
words.defineEn: ‌the business of providing accommodation, services and entertainment for people who are visiting a place for pleasure
words.defineVi: ‌việc kinh doanh cung cấp chỗ ở, dịch vụ và giải trí cho những người đến thăm một nơi để giải trí
